reviews.review: 沒朋友打打ng就好,外掛一堆
Система по поиску игроков с читами не работает!
the best game ever u should play it

Toxic - Yes
Infuriating - Yes
People yelling shit in voice comms - Yes (voice_enable 0 will be your best friend)
cheaters everywhere - Yes
good game for new people - No 

All that said, if you can get past the first few hours of free to play cheaters and painfull death from not understanding the mechanics, this game is extremely addictive.

Counter Strike oder zu Deutsch "Ladentisch Schlag" ist ein sehr gutes, aber frustrierendes Spiel. Ich habe meinen Tisch wie der Name bereits andeutet, sehr oft geschlagen und kaputtgemacht. 
Fazit: Auch wenn das Game kostenlos ist, sind einige Nebenkosten durch emotionale Frustration aufgrund von Counter Strike miteinzuberechnen.

This game is essentially the perfect tac shooter - very high skill ceiling means that you're always improving. And although being stuck in silver gets depressing after a while, the slow creep upwards makes it all worth it. 8/10 because fuck negev users.
really good game ruined by cheaters
